content: विकंप् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To shake, tremble; किं यासि बालकदलीव विकंपमाना <ls>Mk. 1. 20</ls>; स्फुरति नयनं वामो बाहुर्मुहुश्च विकंपते <ls n="Mk.">9. 13</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 31.</ls> {@--2@} To become changed or deformed. {@--3@} To shrink or retreat from. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To shake; <ls>R. 11. 19</ls>; <ls>Rs. 2. 17.</ls>
